citations.narrative:
On 7/9/25, a 3 year old turkey named "Mayflower" was preyed on and killed by a wild fox. Housing facilities must employ
security measures that restrict other animals from entering the enclosure. Failing to do so can result in the predation of
the birds as in what has been documented in this case. Correct starting on 8/28/25.

Rodent droppings were observed throughout one of the food storage areas. In addition, a feed bag from the pigs had
been opened and food was spilling out of the bag. Rodents can spread disease and contaminate food supplies. The
licensee must have a safe and effective pest control program in place to protect the health and well being of the animals.
Correct by 9/28/25.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
End of report.
Additional Inspectors:
LYNNE WHITE-SHIM, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

narrative:
3.150(a)  Critical
   
Facilities, general. 
On 7/9/25, a 3 year old turkey named "Mayflower" was preyed on and killed by a wild fox. Housing facilities must employ 
security measures that restrict other animals from entering the enclosure. Failing to do so can result in the predation of 
the birds as in what has been documented in this case. Correct starting on 8/28/25. 
3.131(d) 
   
Sanitation. 
Rodent droppings were observed throughout one of the food storage areas. In addition, a feed bag from the pigs had 
been opened and food was spilling out of the bag. Rodents can spread disease and contaminate food supplies. The 
licensee must have a safe and effective pest control program in place to protect the health and well being of the animals. 
Correct by 9/28/25. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
End of report. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
LYNNE WHITE-SHIM, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n
